<template>
    <v-container fluid fill-height>
        <v-row no-gutters>
            <v-col>
            <video autoplay muted loop :src="videoSrc" class="fullscreen-video"></video>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row no-gutters>
            <v-col>
            <!-- Your other content can go here -->
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      videoSrc: require('../assets/intro-video.mp4')
    };
  }
};
</script>


<style>
.fullscreen-video {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  z-index: -1;
}
</style>
